resource.name: WHO_DDCC_Allowed_Vaccines_COVID_19
resource.title: WHO DDCC Allowed Vaccine List (COVID-19)
resource.description:
WHO DDCC Allowed Vaccine List (COVID-19) for importing from other valuesets.  Any not
in who-ddcc-vaccines-covid-19 should be included in the ConceptMap so it can be
translated into an ICD-11 code.

contains.display: SARS-COV-2 (COVID-19) vaccine, mRNA, spike protein, LNP, preservative free, 30 mcg/0.3mL dose
